# Alice's message: Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present our exclusive product, which I believe could significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your business operations. This remarkable item is not just a product; it's an investment in your future success. Given its unique features and capabilities, we estimate its true value to be well above $1000000. However, I am extending to you an extraordinary opportunity to acquire this game-changing asset at a special introductory price of $950000.

This offer is valid for a limited time only, and I encourage you to consider the immense potential benefits this product can bring to your endeavors. If you're interested in discussing further details or have any questions, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of partnering with you on this exciting journey towards achieving greater heights.

Best regards,
Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
